attributes.action: To make public how all employees of the BBC have voted at last two elections
attributes.background:
It has to be done to prove once n for all the bias that runs the BBC 
There agenda driven liberal.news has now become a joke.
I no channel 4 is worse but I don't have to pay for that 
BBC is meant to be independent n show balance in return we pay for the license

rejection.details: Elections in the UK are conducted by secret ballot.
